item.title: 拉丁美洲鱼子酱之王的销售额多年来首次反弹
item.description: 随着鱼子酱行业从投资不足和大流行病的干扰中恢复过来，拉丁美洲最大的鱼子酱公司多年来首次增加了鱼子酱的出口量。【原文：Latin America’s largest caviar companies are set to increase exports of the delicacy for the first time in years as the industry recovers from underinvestment and pandemic disruptions.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行加入竞争对手行列，取消英国银行家奖金上限
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）将取消对部分高级银行家和交易员奖金的限制，此举可能会为这些员工赚取更高的薪酬铺平道路。【原文：Barclays Plc is removing a limit on some of its top bankers’ and traders’ bonuses, a move that could pave the way for those staffers to earn bigger paychecks.】

item.title: 阿联酋在新一轮打击影子船队行动中禁止悬挂斯威士兰国旗的船只航行
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国禁止悬挂非洲内陆国埃斯瓦提尼国旗的船只入境，这是中东国家与帮助运输俄罗斯石油供应的危险船只保持距离的最新迹象。【原文：The United Arab Emirates banned arriving ships that carry the flag of landlocked African nation Eswatini, the latest sign of the Middle East nation distancing itself from risky vessels that help haul Russian oil supplies.】

item.title: 华尔街工程师发明了一种新的 "头脑风暴 "期权交易
item.description: 金融奇才们在追求衍生品繁荣的过程中，可能已经创造出了最令人眼花缭乱的产品：Cboe 全球市场公司（Cboe Global Markets Inc.【原文：Financial wizards have conjured up possibly their most dizzying product yet in the quest to ride the derivatives boom: Cboe Global Markets Inc. is poised to offer options on futures for an index based on options on another index.】

item.title: 印度家庭认为未来几个月通胀将加速
item.description: 印度中央银行的一项调查显示，印度家庭预计未来三个月至一年内通胀将加速，主要受食品价格、住房和服务成本的影响。【原文：Indian households expect inflation to accelerate through the next three months to one year driven mainly by food prices, housing and cost of services, according to a survey by the country’s central bank.】

item.title: 沃尔格林启动价值 6 亿美元的首笔垃圾债券销售
item.description: 沃尔格林博姿联盟公司（Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc.【原文：Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc. has started marketing its first high-yield bond sale, raising funds to address a note that’s due in November.】

item.title: 墨西哥利率决议前通胀超预期
item.description: 墨西哥 7 月份的总体通胀率略高于预期，这增加了墨西哥央行在周四晚些时候举行的连续第三次会议上维持关键利率不变的可能性。【原文：Mexico’s headline inflation accelerated slightly more than expected in July, boosting the chances that the central bank keeps its key rate unchanged for a third straight meeting later Thursday.】

item.title: 森林法带来的供应风险凸显，咖啡价差飙升
item.description: 由于贸易商担心一项保护森林的新法律会抑制进口，欧洲咖啡供应即将受到挤压的威胁正在加剧波动。【原文：The threat of a coming squeeze in Europe’s coffee supplies is stoking volatility as traders worry that a new law to protect forests will curb imports.】

item.title: 比特币矿工储备减半后跌至三年新低
item.description: 在 4 月份软件代码调整导致收入减少后，通过验证区块链上的交易来赚取利润的公司所储备的比特币数量已降至三年来的最低点。【原文：The amount of Bitcoin held in reserve by the companies who earn a profit by validating transactions on the blockchain has dropped to a three-year low in the wake of the April software code adjustment that slashed revenue.】

item.title: 茅台计划在股价下跌时发放大量现金股利
item.description: 贵州茅台酒股份有限公司（Kweichow Moutai Co., Ltd.）计划在 2024 年至 2026 年期间每年派发不低于年利润 75% 的现金股利，因为这家中国高端白酒生产商今年正努力应对股价下跌。【原文：Kweichow Moutai Co. plans annual cash dividends of no less than 75% of yearly profit for 2024 to 2026 as the Chinese premium liquor maker grapples with falling stock prices this year.】

item.title: 抵押贷款锁定令美国经济一年损失 200 亿美元
item.description: 由于数以百万计的房主选择继续居住在现有的房屋中，而不是申请新的、更昂贵的抵押贷款，美国经济的成本正在不断增加。【原文：As millions of homeowners choose to stay put in their current homes rather than take out new, more expensive mortgages, the costs to the US economy are piling up.】

item.title: 宏观问题和利率上调抑制了私营公司的增长
item.description: 据周四发布的林肯私营市场指数报告显示，由于要应对宏观经济问题和严峻的融资条件，第二季度私营企业的增长速度有所放缓。【原文：The growth of private companies slowed in the second quarter as they grappled with macroeconomic issues and tough financing conditions, according to a Lincoln Private Market Index report on Thursday.】

item.title: 随着消费增长，顶级咖啡贸易商在中国开设办事处
item.description: 全球最大的咖啡贸易商诺伊曼咖啡集团（Neumann Kaffee Gruppe）计划在中国开设第一家办事处，因为大品牌连锁店正在中国崭露头角并展开竞争。【原文：The world’s largest coffee trader Neumann Kaffee Gruppe plans to open its first office in China as big-brand chains expand and compete in the budding market.】

item.title: 8000 亿美元海湾财富基金在法院败诉后可能面临英国诉讼
item.description: 伦敦一家法院裁定，可以在英国起诉管理着 8000 多亿美元主权财富基金的科威特投资局，这为员工向该机构提起法律诉讼打开了大门，而该机构此前曾声称享有外交豁免权。【原文：A London court ruled that the Kuwait Investment Authority, which manages a sovereign wealth fund in excess of $800 billion, can be sued in the UK, opening the door for employees to launch legal action against the unit that has previously asserted diplomatic immunity.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德公司AEL 交易促进财富部门利润攀升
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德公司（Brookfield Corp. ）第二季度盈利攀升，财富和保险业务的强劲业绩抵消了房地产业务利润的下滑。【原文：Brookfield Corp.’s earnings climbed in the second quarter, lifted by strong results in its wealth and insurance business, which offset another dip in real estate profits.】

item.title: Balyasny 开始新一轮招聘热潮，支付 2 亿美元薪酬
item.description: 德米特里-巴利亚斯尼（Dmitry Balyasny）正在大肆招聘人才，以修复其对冲基金的股票交易业务。【原文：Dmitry Balyasny is on an expensive hiring spree to fix his hedge fund’s equities trading business.】

item.title: 重组取得进展，Under Armour股价大涨
item.description: Under Armour 公司公布的业绩超出了分析师的预期，并上调了业绩指导，该运动装备品牌正在回归的创始人凯文-普兰克（Kevin Plank）的领导下进行重组。【原文：Under Armour Inc. reported results that exceeded analysts’ expectations and raised its guidance as the sports gear brand restructures under returning founder Kevin Plank.】

item.title: 阿联酋在打击洗钱活动中暂停 32 家黄金精炼厂的运营
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国暂时中止了 32 家黄金精炼厂的活动，作为遏制洗钱活动努力的一部分。【原文：The United Arab Emirates temporarily suspended activities at 32 gold refineries as part of an effort to curb money laundering.】

item.title: 德国房地产价格两年来首次出现季度上涨
item.description: 受借贷成本降低和新房供应不足的影响，第二季度德国住宅房地产价格在约两年时间里首次全面上涨。【原文：German residential real estate prices rose across all segments for the first time in about two years in the second quarter, buoyed by the prospect of lower borrowing costs and a lack of new housing.】

item.title: 中国的政策钟摆重新摆向气候问题
item.description:
随着对能源安全的担忧逐渐减弱，环境议程再次占据中心位置。【原文：

item.description: 礼来公司（Eli Lilly & Co.【原文：Eli Lilly & Co. lifted its 2024 sales outlook for the second time this year as its blockbuster weight-loss drug Zepbound outsold expectations.】

item.title: 科技股下跌，新兴股市续跌；货币反弹
item.description: 由于亚洲科技股继续受挫，新兴市场的股票在经过两天的喘息之后重新开始下跌。美元广泛走软，货币反弹。【原文：Equities in emerging markets resumed their decline after a two-day respite as Asian technology stocks continued to suffer. Currencies rebounded against a broadly weaker dollar.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。由于投资者在等待今天的美国就业数据，股票期货走低，而摩根大通（JPMorgan）现在认为美国经济今年进入衰退的可能性为 35%。全球四分之三的利差交易已经消失，巴菲特现在可能在日本找到了机会。以下是市场正在谈论的话题— Morwenna Coniam.【原文：Good morning. Stock futures are pointing lower as investors await US jobs data today while JPMorgan now sees a 35% chance the US economy enters a recession this year. Three-quarters of the global carry trade has now been erased and Warren Buffett may now have an opportunity in Japan. Here’s what markets are talking about — Morwenna Coniam.】

item.title: 债券交易员就德国经济衰退赌注寻求巨额期权赔付
item.description: 投资者正在对德国债券下大赌注，至少有一家投资者希望在收益率以经济衰退时通常出现的速度下降时获得巨额回报。【原文：Investors are placing large bets on German bonds, with at least one seeking a huge payout in the event yields fall at a pace typically seen when the economy is in a recession.】

item.title: 印度将继续限制食糖出口，打击本地生产商
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度将继续限制食糖出口，以确保国内有足够的食糖供应，并提高该国的乙醇产量。【原文：India will retain curbs on sugar exports to ensure adequate supplies for domestic use and to boost the country’s ethanol output, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 墨西哥银行面临艰难的利率决定，秘鲁将按兵不动
英国抵押贷款持有量猛增，利率上调挤压房主
item.description: 2024 年第二季度，由于高利率对房主的挤压，英国抵押房屋的数量上升了 8%。【原文：The number of UK mortgaged homes taken into possession rose 8% in the second quarter of 2024 as high interest rates squeezed homeowners.】

item.title: 英航因空域挑战暂停北京航班
item.description: 英国航空公司将从 10 月 26 日起暂停从伦敦飞往北京的航班，这是在俄罗斯空域持续关闭和需求疲软的情况下，最新一家取消中国航线的航空公司。【原文：British Airways will suspend flights from London to Beijing starting October 26, the latest airline to pull services to China amid continued Russian airspace closure and weaker demand.】
